title: FS: T206, (Ganley, etc. Sold) Prices lowered Jan. 8th
author: edjs

posts.post_title: FS: T206, (Ganley, etc. Sold) Prices lowered Jan. 8th
posts.post_content:
Hi all, I'm looking to sell some T206. I will be listing more as these sell.  I accept  PayPal,  check or MO  for    these.  Prices are net to me, so please add 3%  for  regular  PayPal.   Domestic shipping is $3.50 for orders under $100, over  $100 is on me.   Shipping to other countries, I will work  with you on  price.  
 
 Additional scans available on  request.  Thanks, and feel free to e-mail any questions: [URL="skeltone@rocketmail.com"]skeltone@rocketmail.com[/URL].
First commitment to buy will go before ongoing negotiations.
